DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administrated CBT is a feasible approach in the treatment of anxiety symptoms and comorbid anxiety and depressive symptoms in a clinical setting.
DOC.brief_title: Internet-administrated Treatment of Anxiety Symptoms for Young Adults
DOC.criteria: Be between the ages of 1625 years old Have anxiety symptoms and/or anxiety syndrome Suicide prone Alcohol addiction Ongoing psychological treatment
